mapper.sql: STAFF_ID, STAFF_NAME, STAFF_SEX, STAFF_PHOTO, ID_NUMBER, HOME_ADDRESS, NOW_ADDRESS, STAFF_EDUCATION, POLITICAL_OUTLOOK, GRADUATE_SCHOOL, TELEPHONE, ONLINE_CONTACT_WAY, ONLINE_CONTACT_DETAIL, AUDIT_STATUS, JOB_ID, STAFF_STATE, NOTES, COMPANY_ID, LAST_MODIFY_DATE
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from RS_USER_DETAIL
order by ${orderByClause}

select
from RS_USER_DETAIL
where STAFF_NAME like '%${staffName}%'
mapper.insert: insert into RS_USER_DETAIL (STAFF_ID, STAFF_NAME, STAFF_SEX, STAFF_PHOTO, ID_NUMBER, HOME_ADDRESS, NOW_ADDRESS, STAFF_EDUCATION, POLITICAL_OUTLOOK, GRADUATE_SCHOOL, TELEPHONE, ONLINE_CONTACT_WAY, ONLINE_CONTACT_DETAIL, AUDIT_STATUS, JOB_ID, STAFF_STATE, NOTES, COMPANY_ID, LAST_MODIFY_DATE) values (#{staffId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{staffName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{homeAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nowAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffEducation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{politicalOutlook,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{graduateSchool,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{onlineContactWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{onlineContactDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{staffState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lastModifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into RS_USER_DETAIL
STAFF_ID,
STAFF_NAME,
STAFF_SEX,
STAFF_PHOTO,
ID_NUMBER,

LAST_MODIFY_DATE,

mapper.update:
update RS_USER_DETAIL
STAFF_ID = #{record.staffId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STAFF_NAME = #{record.staffName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAFF_SEX = #{record.staffSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAFF_PHOTO = #{record.staffPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ID_NUMBER = #{record.idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HOME_ADDRESS = #{record.homeAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NOW_ADDRESS = #{record.nowAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAFF_EDUCATION = #{record.staffEducation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

GRADUATE_SCHOOL = #{record.graduateSchool,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

JOB_ID = #{record.jobId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STAFF_STATE = #{record.staffState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NOTES = #{record.notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY_ID = #{record.companyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_MODIFY_DATE = #{record.lastModifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update RS_USER_DETAIL set STAFF_ID = #{record.staffId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STAFF_NAME = #{record.staffName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STAFF_SEX = #{record.staffSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STAFF_PHOTO = #{record.staffPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ID_NUMBER = #{record.idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOME_ADDRESS = #{record.homeAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOW_ADDRESS = #{record.nowAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STAFF_EDUCATION = #{record.staffEducation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POLITICAL_OUTLOOK = #{record.politicalOutlook,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GRADUATE_SCHOOL = #{record.graduateSchool,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TELEPHONE = #{record.telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ONLINE_CONTACT_WAY = #{record.onlineContactWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ONLINE_CONTACT_DETAIL = #{record.onlineContactDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUDIT_STATUS = #{record.auditStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JOB_ID = #{record.jobId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STAFF_STATE = #{record.staffState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOTES = #{record.notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANY_ID = #{record.companyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_MODIFY_DATE = #{record.lastModifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update RS_USER_DETAIL
STAFF_NAME = #{staffName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAFF_SEX = #{staffSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAFF_PHOTO = #{staffPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ID_NUMBER = #{idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HOME_ADDRESS = #{homeAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NOW_ADDRESS = #{nowAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAFF_EDUCATION = #{staffEducation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POLITICAL_OUTLOOK = #{politicalOutlook,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GRADUATE_SCHOOL = #{graduateSchool,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TELEPHONE = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ONLINE_CONTACT_WAY = #{onlineContactWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ONLINE_CONTACT_DETAIL = #{onlineContactDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AUDIT_STATUS = #{auditStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JOB_ID = #{jobId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STAFF_STATE = #{staffState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where STAFF_ID = #{staffId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
